title: Para Elisa (2012)
overview: A young college is responsible for the care of an innocent little girl, but soon all he knows give a twist that will endanger his own life. All begin when crossing under the floor of the third floor to the left, a road without knowing directly the door open to the forces of evil, freeing them at will through the building. A desperate race to save the lives when terror and pure evil are in the next aisle.
storyline: Para Elisa is a terrifying story based on a simple, innocent children's game. Something that looks naive and harmless turns into the worst nightmare, into the struggle to escape a tragic and expected end, into an explicit and inevitable horror.
synopsis: Dare to play with dolls?Para Elisa is a terrifying story based on a simple, innocent children's game. Something that looks naive and harmless turns into the worst nightmare, into the struggle to escape a tragic and expected end, into an explicit and inevitable horror.Para Elisa walks us through an endless night of suffering and it presents characters separated by two conflicting, antagonist positions: good and evil, rational and irrational, mature and immature.Dare to enter apartment 3B and play...Walk up the stairs, enter 3B, walk down the hall accompanied by a sweet children's song, enjoy tea and cookies, meet an innocent little girl you will care for... All this could be the beginning of a normal afternoon for a young college student. Just a normal afternoon...But what if going through that doorway, you go into the mouth of evil, into Diamantina's and Elisa playroom and you, the young student, become the toy of a demented being? Then it is not just a normal afternoon. It's the last.
